BALI HORSE RIDING TOUR

BALI HORSE RIDING TOUR IS TO ENJOY HORSEBACK RIDING ADVENTURE TOURS IN BALI ISLANDS PASSED THROUGH THE BEAUTIFUL BEACH AND SEE THE UNIQUE BALINESE LIFE

Bali Horse Riding Tour is a Bali Activities Tour Packages by offer horse back riding adventure in beautiful beach with amazing view and sound of the waves make the horse back riding more enjoyable. We have the expertise to bring you an exceptional equestrian adventure. Horseback riding may not be the first thing that comes to mind when you think of Bali activities. Sure, there are the spectacular mountain views, balinese village, endless sparkling beach. So why not add horseback riding to the list? You and the kids will love it, walking or gently trotting with your horse, reins in hand. When it comes to horse riding activities, of course it is always nice to hear and especially to do it, here we provide an opportunity for those of you who want to do horse riding on the beach with a duration of between one hour and one and a half hours at a relatively cheap and affordable price.

Horse Riding Experience

The experiences and scenery of this Bali Horse Riding Tour will not be easily forgotten. The sounds of horses hooves echoing through the crashing waves of amazing beach, take a unique look at Balinese life as you pass the local village and onto the beautiful sandy beach. Is amazing experience you will remember for all your life. It provides the exciting horse riding adventures by the best selection of tame and healthy horses to explore the beautiful beach with sea breeze blowing and covers the coastal area. It is an ideal adventure that you must join and feel the warm atmosphere of tropical ambiance flows from the Indian Ocean and your adventure will be unforgettable one on your lovely vacation in the paradise island of Bali. An experience that is second to none for those of you who love horses and want to ride horses here, this horse riding activity is very impressive and will definitely make your holiday on the island of Bali complete.

Ride Horse in Bali Islands

Enjoy your holiday by Riding Horse in Bali Islands to see the amazing panorama view on horseback and turn other people's dreams into reality. After arriving and welcome at the Horse stable, you will receive a full safety breafing from professional and experience horse riding guide before embarking a memorable horse riding adventure. The horse riding trail has been set on the beautiful beautiful sand on the beach with thundering wave sound. Your Bali Horseback Riding Tour more enjoyable with our friendly and professional Bali Horse Riding tour guide. Enjoy riding a horse on the island of Bali through the beautiful beach with black sand which is very tempting, and the rustle of the wind and waves makes the atmosphere even more enjoyable, so what are you waiting for, want to ride a horse in Bali, contact us immediately and we will prepare everything for you, from being picked up at the hotel, riding a horse and dropping back to the hotel

Bali Horse Riding Tour Program :

Morning Horse Ride

  • 08.30 - Pick up at hotel
  • 10.00 - Horse riding tour
  • 12.00 - Back to hotel
  • 13.30 - Arrive at hotel

Midday Horse Ride

  • 11.00 - pick up at hotel
  • 12.30 - Enjoy Horse Riding
  • 14.30 - Back to hotel
  • 16.00 - Arrive at hotel

Afternoon Horse Ride

  • 13.30 - pick up at hotel
  • 15.00 - Enjoy Horse Riding
  • 16.00 - Back to hotel
  • 17.30 - Arrive at hotel

Bali Horse Riding Tour Price :

Bali Horse Riding (1 Hours)

  • Adult : IDR 750.000 / person
  • Children (7 -12 years old): IDR 650.000 / person

Note :

  • Price is Minimun booking for 2 person
  • Solo Traveler will have add charge IDR 200000
  • Get Special Price for Group Booking
  • Maximum weight is 90kg

Bali Horse Back Riding Tour Price Includes:

  • Return Transfer from and to your hotel
  • 1 Hours Horse Back Riding
  • Insurance liability covered
  • Experienced Horse Riding Guides
  • International Standard Riding Equipment

What to Bring during Bali Horse Riding Tour :

  • Change of clotches
  • Comfortable Shoes
  • Long or shorts pants
  • Camera
  • Sunscreen
  • Towel
